Text:
REALLY THANKING FROM MY HEART, ALL YOUR UPLOADS FOR ARE EXCELLENT.
YOU ARE DOING GREAT FOR HELPING US WHERE I AM STRUGGLING TO BUY BOOKS FOR HEAVY PRICE . 
AS A FILM STUDENT I KNOW HOW MUCH WORTH THEY ARE

Check out http://box.net/leeroy/ for more books:
? If It's Purple Someone's Gonna Die
? Practical Cinematography - by Paul Wheeler
? The Visual Story
? Understanding Digital Cinema
? Special Optical Effects - by Zoran Perisic
? Exploring the Color Image - Kodak brochure
This is a great one. I was wondering if anyone here has "The Filmmaker's Pocket Reference," also by Blain Brown. I can't seem to find it anywhere on the internet.

akeleeroy!

I thank you from the bottom of my heart.

In Gratitude..

If there is any torrent that you cannot find, plz mention here and we shall do our level best to get it for you..

Thanks again..
